markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Summon Fey](/Spells.aspx?ID=322)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 375 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Gendowyn](/Deities.aspx?ID=152), [Gendowyn](/Deities.aspx?ID=152)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Three Actions" /></row>
<row>[material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You conjure a fey to fight for you. This works like [_summon animal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=316), except you summon a common creature that has the [fey](/Traits.aspx?ID=69) trait and whose level is –1, such as those below.

---
**Heightened (2nd)** Level 1.

**Heightened (3rd)** Level 2.

**Heightened (4th)** Level 3.

**Heightened (5th)** Level 5.

**Heightened (6th)** Level 7.

**Heightened (7th)** Level 9.

**Heightened (8th)** Level 11.

**Heightened (9th)** Level 13.

**Heightened (10th)** Level 15.
name: Summon Fey

summary: Conjure a fey to fight on your behalf.
summary_markdown: Conjure a fey to fight on your behalf.
text: Summon Fey Source Core Rulebook pg. 375 4.0 Traditions Occult, Primal Deities Gendowyn, Gendowyn Cast Three Actions material, somatic, verbal Range 30 feet Duration sustained up to 1 minute --- You conjure a fey to fight for you. This works like summon animal , except you summon a common creature that has the fey trait and whose level is –1, such as those below. --- Heightened (2nd) Level 1. Heightened (3rd) Level 2. Heightened (4th) Level 3. Heightened (5th) Level 5. Heightened (6th) Level 7. Heightened (7th) Level 9. Heightened (8th) Level 11. Heightened (9th) Level 13. Heightened (10th) Level 15.
